column9: I ordered double salami with double cheese. They charged 117kr. I got margarita with salami. I complained but the guy just walked away. I won't go here never again. Horrible taste..
Ordered via Online Pizza and can not recommend it. Had to make 3 calls just to get my order. Food was decent not much to say about it.

Gut gegliederte Karte. Die Pizza war gut. Preislich absolut in Ordnung. Mit Selbstbedienung gut für ein schnelles Essen.

column7: Hel OK gott men relativt dyrt och långsamt
column9: Ganska alldaglig pizza och kebab till ett förhållandevis högt pris. Tar ofta en rätt bra stund att få maten också.
